title: Sales Development Representative
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Roles & Responsibility:

The Sales Development Representative is the very first contact that customers and partners have at Nice.
Interact with lots of different people and businesses, and you will have the opportunity to create an incredible first impression for Nice’s customer over the phone, on chat on our website and over email and social channels.
The purpose of this position is to generate new sales qualified leads for our Corporate and Enterprise sales teams, provide an immediate response to all inbound enquiries and also proactively target customers with outbound calls, emails and social outreach, who would benefit from Nice’s services.
You will work very closely with our Marketing, Channel and Sales teams to continually generate new target accounts and prospect into them using multiple difference techniques to ensure success.
Specifically, you will support marketing activities by generating interest for events, webinars, campaigns and promotions, ensuring good attendance, then follow up and converting marketing leads into sales qualified leads.  

  
Primary Skill:

Exceptional communication and presentations skills that build confidence and credibility. Possess flexibility and confidence. Be able to articulate and confidently explain complex models in a clear simplified manner
Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Communications or similar field or equivalent work experience required
2+ years’ experience in Sales or Business Development
Solid understanding of prospecting and qualification techniques
Excellent customer service skills
Strong understanding of sales and marketing environments
Proven track record of meeting/exceeding business generation targets
Experience in working with CRM such as Salesforce and Prosecting tools such as Sales loft

Good to Have:

Software related sales preferred
Experience in VoIP-related, contact centre technology, digital CX and AI helpful
About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
